TEXT.TITLE: KRAFT <KRA> COMPLETES BUY OF QUAKER <OAT> UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Kraft Inc said it has completed the previously announced acquisition of the Anderson Clayton Foods Division from Quaker Oats Co for 235 mln dlrs in cash. Reuter
